alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kemper and northeastern Lauderdale Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Meridian Station, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lauderdale around 310 PM CDT. Meridian Station and Daleville around 315 PM CDT. Blackwater around 325 PM CDT. Tamola around 330 PM CDT. Porterville around 350 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
